696650.name: BLACK DAY
696650.description:
BLACK DAY is a single player Sandbox tactical shooter that allows you to personalize the game experience by setting different variables such as equipment, location, difficulty and type of Hostile encounters. Customization options that lets you design different scenarios from fun and easy to hardcore infiltration missions where even twitching may result in your death.


FEATURES
***Singleplayer***
***First person or third person view***
***Three games mode: SPEC OPS / FACTIONS WAR / APOCALYPSE***
***24 unique and open maps*** Travel towards exotic landscapes in large open world maps, assault a medieval castle or infiltrate a residential area. Various and unique environments that lets you decide how to proceed.
***Unlimited Gameplay*** Multitude of options are at your disposal so you can tweak the game how you want it, giving players a unique experience every time.
***Diverse mission layouts*** Conduct stealthy assasination kills, Rescue Hostages, Destroy radio towers,Retrieve intel...
***Guns and equipment*** With more then 25 guns (assault, sniper rifles, handguns...) and a wide range of explosives (EMP, frag, flashbang…), adapt your equipment to your play style.
***Characters customization*** Customize clothes of your character and teammates
***Game difficulty customization*** Over 20 customizable options lets you adjust difficulty the way you want (Ai detection, Hostile forces, equipment,Health and much more...)
***Immersive infiltration*** Recon drones, cover system, jump over obstacles, underwater swimming, hide corpses, sneak attacks and many other actions to provide an immersive experience.
***Teammates*** Don't combat alone and command your squad.
***Various type of Hostiles*** Fight against the simple rebel to the most advanced spec op soldiers in different factions. Wide range of Hostile assets and security systems for endless challenge.
***Progression system*** Gain experience by completing objectives to unlock new guns,equipment and maps.
